selectedVerses.text: Again I will build you, and you shall be built, O virgin Israel! Again you shall adorn yourself with tambourines and shall go forth in the dance of the merrymakers.
Praise him with tambourine and dance; praise him with strings and pipe!
a time to weep, and a time to laugh; a time to mourn, and a time to dance;
They send out their little boys like a flock, and their children dance.
They are like children sitting in the marketplace and calling to one another, "'We played the flute for you, and you did not dance; we sang a dirge, and you did not weep.'
